author: cms-sw
body:
This should fix the following [error](https://cmssdt.cern.ch/jenkins/job/build-any-ib/180266/consoleFull):

```
00:01:11 error: Failed dependencies:
00:01:11 	libpcre2-8.so.0()(64bit) is needed by lcg+root+6.32.01-d574e82432e5fe4d6af5cb531d557a78-1-1.x86_64
```
title: [ROOT632] Change dependency to pcre2
